executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Test all the new features we implemented: fullscreen PDF reader with entire screen coverage, manual page navigation, arrow key navigation, increased audio volume, responsive design with hidden buttons on mobile/tablet, updated contact email, and copyright year. Verify that the PDF reader works correctly in fullscreen mode and covers the entire screen. Test the manual page navigation input field and arrow key functionality. Verify that the audio volume is increased and the responsive design changes work properly on different screen sizes.
